name: Become Darwin in 10 Seconds
description:
Become Darwin in 10 seconds is a game jam DEMO where you will solve the puzzle of the Evolution of man by simply click and drag. The goal is to complete the timeline of evolution in under 10 seconds.

Enjoy this 10-second experience and become Darwin:) 

This game is recommended to be played with mouse.

Game made by  Panyapha (Jib)Leekitwattana and Jiyuan (David) Zhan
